newsitem.title: SOUTH AFRICA: Nedcor in $6mln loan for PTA Bank.
newsitem.headline: Nedcor in $6mln loan for PTA Bank.

text.p: Nedcor Bank Ltd said on Wednesday it had signed a five-year $6 million structured credit agreement with the Eastern and South African Trade and Development Bank, known as the PTA Bank.

The loan will enable South African company Meateng Africa (Pty) Ltd to fulfil a contract for the design, manufacture, installation and commissioning of an abattoir and meat processing plant in Omdurman, Sudan.
